languages.text: Осознавая себя существом, повинным перед Императором хотя бы по причине своего нечистого существования, Номос с особым рвением истребляли скверну, выжигая подчас целые миры. Такие слабости человеческой натуры, как сомнение, милосердие или отвращение к себе были неведомы совершенному Зверю Бога-Императора.

Perceiving themselves as an entity deeply beholden to the Emperor, at the very least on account of their unholy existence, Nomos exterminated corruption with extra zeal, sometimes razing entire worlds. Weaknesses of human nature, such as doubt, mercy, or self-loathing, were unknown to the God-Emperor's perfect Beast.
languages.original_text: Осознавая себя существом, повинным перед Императором хотя бы по причине своего нечистого существования, Номос с особым рвением истребляли скверну, выжигая подчас целые миры. Такие слабости человеческой натуры, как сомнение, милосердие или отвращение к себе были неведомы совершенному Зверю Бога-Императора.

traits.locale_text: Perceiving themself as an entity deeply guilty before the Emperor at the very least on account of their unrighteous existence, Nomos exterminated corruption with extra zeal, sometimes burning down entire worlds. Such weakness of human nature, such as doubt, mercy or self-loathing were unknown to the perfect Beast of the God-Emperor.

Perceiving themself as an entity deeply guilty before the Emperor at the very least on account of their unrighteous existence, Nomos exterminated corruption with extra zeal, sometimes burning down entire worlds. Such weakness of human nature, such as doubt, mercy or self-loathing were unknown to the perfect Beast of the God-Emperor.

Perceiving themselves as an entity deeply beholden to the Emperor, at the very least on account of their unholy existence, Nomos exterminated corruption with extra zeal, sometimes razing entire worlds. Such weaknesses of human nature, such as doubt, mercy, or self-loathing, were unknown to the God-Emperor's perfect Beast.

Such weaknesses of human nature, such as doubt, mercy, or self-loathing, were unknown to the God-Emperor's perfect Beast.

Perceiving themselves as an entity deeply beholden to the Emperor, at the very least on account of their unholy existence, Nomos exterminated corruption with extra zeal, sometimes razing entire worlds. Weaknesses of human nature, such as doubt, mercy, or self-loathing, were unknown to the God-Emperor's perfect Beast.

Perceiving themselves as an entity deeply beholden to the Emperor, at the very least on account of their unholy existence, Nomos exterminated corruption with extra zeal, sometimes razing entire worlds. Weaknesses of human nature, such as doubt, mercy, or self-loathing, were unknown to the God-Emperor's perfect Beast.

languages.text: 诺莫斯认为，光是自己那不洁的存在，就已足以让它们在帝皇面前身负重罪。它们格外热情地消灭腐化，有时甚至会夷平整个世界。这头忠于神皇的完美野兽从不知所谓的“人性弱点”，它们的思想中不存在怀疑、怜悯或自我厌弃。
languages.original_text: Perceiving themselves as an entity deeply beholden to the Emperor, at the very least on account of their unholy existence, Nomos exterminated corruption with extra zeal, sometimes razing entire worlds. Weaknesses of human nature, such as doubt, mercy, or self-loathing, were unknown to the God-Emperor's perfect Beast.

traits.locale_text: 诺莫斯认为，光是自己那不洁的存在，就已足以让它们在帝皇面前身负重罪。它们格外热情地消灭腐化，有时甚至会夷平整个世界。这头忠于神皇的完美野兽从不知所谓的“人性弱点”，它们的思想中不存在怀疑、怜悯或自我厌弃。

languages.text: Nomos sehen sich als Wesen, das dem Imperator bedingungslos verpflichtet ist, allein schon ob der Tatsache ihrer unheiligen Existenz. Sie löschten die Verderbnis daher mit besonderem Eifer aus, wo sie sie auch fanden. Manchmal verwandelten sie ganze Welten in Schutt und Asche. Schwächen des menschlichen Wesens wie Zweifel, Gnade oder Selbsthass waren dem perfekten Monstrum des Gottimperators nicht bekannt.
languages.original_text: Perceiving themselves as an entity deeply beholden to the Emperor, at the very least on account of their unholy existence, Nomos exterminated corruption with extra zeal, sometimes razing entire worlds. Weaknesses of human nature, such as doubt, mercy, or self-loathing, were unknown to the God-Emperor's perfect Beast.

traits.locale_text: Nomos sehen sich als Wesen, das dem Imperator bedingungslos verpflichtet ist, allein schon ob der Tatsache ihrer unheiligen Existenz. Sie löschten die Verderbnis daher mit besonderem Eifer aus, wo sie sie auch fanden. Manchmal verwandelten sie ganze Welten in Schutt und Asche. Schwächen des menschlichen Wesens wie Zweifel, Gnade oder Selbsthass waren dem perfekten Monstrum des Gottimperators nicht bekannt.

languages.text: Se percevant comme une entité profondément redevable à l'Empereur, notamment en raison de son existence impie, Nomos redoubla de zèle pour éradiquer la corruption, rasant parfois des mondes entiers. La parfaite créature de l'Empereur-Dieu ignorait tout des faiblesses de la nature humaine comme le doute, la miséricorde ou le dégoût de soi.
languages.original_text: Perceiving themselves as an entity deeply beholden to the Emperor, at the very least on account of their unholy existence, Nomos exterminated corruption with extra zeal, sometimes razing entire worlds. Weaknesses of human nature, such as doubt, mercy, or self-loathing, were unknown to the God-Emperor's perfect Beast.

traits.locale_text: Se percevant comme une entité profondément redevable à l'Empereur, notamment en raison de son existence impie, Nomos redoubla de zèle pour éradiquer la corruption, rasant parfois des mondes entiers. La parfaite créature de l'Empereur-Dieu ignorait tout des faiblesses de la nature humaine comme le doute, la miséricorde ou le dégoût de soi.

languages.text: Al percibirse como una entidad en gran deuda con el Emperador, al menos debido a su existencia impía, Nomos exterminó la corrupción con especial fervor, llegando a arrasar mundos enteros en ocasiones. Las debilidades de la raza humana, como la duda, la piedad o el autodesprecio, eran totalmente ajenas a la bestia perfecta del Dios Emperador.
languages.original_text: Perceiving themselves as an entity deeply beholden to the Emperor, at the very least on account of their unholy existence, Nomos exterminated corruption with extra zeal, sometimes razing entire worlds. Weaknesses of human nature, such as doubt, mercy, or self-loathing, were unknown to the God-Emperor's perfect Beast.

traits.locale_text: Al percibirse como una entidad en gran deuda con el Emperador, al menos debido a su existencia impía, Nomos exterminó la corrupción con especial fervor, llegando a arrasar mundos enteros en ocasiones. Las debilidades de la raza humana, como la duda, la piedad o el autodesprecio, eran totalmente ajenas a la bestia perfecta del Dios Emperador.

languages.text: ノモスは自らを、少なくともその穢れた存在ゆえに皇帝に深く忠実な存在であると認識しており、非常に熱心に腐敗を駆逐し、時には世界を完全に壊滅するほどであった。疑いや慈悲、自己嫌悪といった人間の本性の弱点は、神帝陛下の完璧な獣にはわからなかった。
languages.original_text: Perceiving themselves as an entity deeply beholden to the Emperor, at the very least on account of their unholy existence, Nomos exterminated corruption with extra zeal, sometimes razing entire worlds. Weaknesses of human nature, such as doubt, mercy, or self-loathing, were unknown to the God-Emperor's perfect Beast.

traits.locale_text: ノモスは自らを、少なくともその穢れた存在ゆえに皇帝に深く忠実な存在であると認識しており、非常に熱心に腐敗を駆逐し、時には世界を完全に壊滅するほどであった。疑いや慈悲、自己嫌悪といった人間の本性の弱点は、神帝陛下の完璧な獣にはわからなかった。

languages.text: Yozlaşmanın din dışı mevcudiyetinden sorumlu olduğunu düşündüğü için kendisini İmparator'a derinden borçlu hisseden Nomos, yozlaşmışlığı son derece büyük bir hiddetle bertaraf etti. Bazen dünyaları tümüyle yok ettiği bile oldu. İnsan zihninin sahip olduğu şüphe, merhamet, kendinden nefret etme gibi zayıflıklar, Tanrı İmparator'un kusursuz Yaratık'ı için yoktular.
languages.original_text: Perceiving themselves as an entity deeply beholden to the Emperor, at the very least on account of their unholy existence, Nomos exterminated corruption with extra zeal, sometimes razing entire worlds. Weaknesses of human nature, such as doubt, mercy, or self-loathing, were unknown to the God-Emperor's perfect Beast.

Bazen dünyaları tümüyle yok ettiği bile oldu. İnsan zihninin sahip olduğu şüphe, merhamet, kendinden nefret etme gibi zayıflıklar, Tanrı İmparator'un kusursuz Yaratık'ı için yoktular.
